name: questionaire
shortDescription: A simple assessment tool with about 5 questions per criteria of the EFQM Model.  The best tool to conduct a first assessment, helping identify the current position and determine future directions and priorities.

keyInformation.guidance: We are here to help you fill out the key information

criteria.name: example pillar
criteria.description: This sample text describes the context and purpose of this particular criterion.
criteria.guidance: This sample text provides further guidance to help users understand the expectations around working with this criterion.

parts.guidance: This sample text provides guidance for this part

tables.name: example criterion part table
tables.guidance: This sample text provides guidance for this table

scores.name: example score 1
scores.description: This sample text describes this scoring item.

scores.name: example score 2
scores.description: This sample text describes this scoring item.
